com.sowapps.subket.hub

Class SubketApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sowapps.subket.hub.SubketApplication

  • public class SubketApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    Declare a specific application to the subket, each application has its own client and server peers.
    Author:
    Florent HAZARD

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.net.Socket connecting,
                    boolean isServer)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect socket to the application, client to server, server to client and if pear available, the socket waits for a new one. It creates a new proxy to communicate between peers.
        Parameters:
        connecting -
        isServer -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
